title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\UpdateProductRequest
name: UpdateProductRequest
description:
Request message for [ProductService.UpdateProduct][google.cloud.retail.v2.ProductService.UpdateProduct] method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.UpdateProductRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.product
params.description: Required. The product to update/create. If the caller does not have permission to update the [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product], regardless of whether or not it exists, a PERMISSION_DENIED error is returned. If the [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] to update does not exist and [allow_missing][google.cloud.retail.v2.UpdateProductRequest.allow_missing] is not set, a NOT_FOUND error is returned.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Indicates which fields in the provided [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] to update. The immutable and output only fields are NOT supported. If not set, all supported fields (the fields that are neither immutable nor output only) are updated. If an unsupported or unknown field is provided, an INVALID_ARGUMENT error is returned. The attribute key can be updated by setting the mask path as "attributes.${key_name}". If a key name is present in the mask but not in the patching product from the request, this key will be deleted after the update.

params.name: data.allow_missing
params.description: If set to true, and the [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] is not found, a new [Product][google.cloud.retail.v2.Product] will be created. In this situation, update_mask is ignored.
